summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting deposition transcripts related to the Epstein case. The email indicates the sharing of official legal documents, likely for review or further proceedings.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting deposition transcripts from the Southern District of New York.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Deposition transcripts were shared via email on August 11, 2020.
The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email is marked as external, indicating communication possibly outside the DOJ network.
Attachments include deposition transcripts dated June 24, 2016.
The correspondence shows ongoing legal document exchange in the Epstein case.
